DOC.brief_summary: Inactivation FAAH ( Fatty Acid Amide Hydrolase ) enzyme show relieve pain inflammation animal study . PF-04457845 show inactivate FAAH enzyme animal healthy human volunteer . The purpose study evaluate whether PF-04457845 inactivate FAAH enzyme patient experience pain due OA whether result patient experience less pain .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate Whether PF-04457845 Is Effective In Treating Pain , Is Safe And Tolerable In Patients With Osteoarthritis Of The Knee
DOC.criteria: Subjects must diagnosis Osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee confirm Xray Subjects must willing able stop current pain therapy duration study . ( Limited specific pain therapy available throughout study ) Subjects male female age 18 75 year inclusive , female subject must able become pregnant Subjects must condition medical history might interfere ability complete study assessment
DOC.keyword: Cross-over evaluate efficacy PF-04457845 relieving pain due osteoarthritis OA knee osteoarthritis knee pain due osteoarthritis
